description:
**Fix Overview**:

To prevent issues with desktop icons moving unexpectedly on Windows devices using multimonitor configurations when attempting to use Copilot in Windows (in preview):

1. Ensure that your taskbar is positioned horizontally at the top or bottom of your screen.
2. If the taskbar is currently positioned vertically on the right or left side, move it to a horizontal position.

**Details**:
- Copilot in Windows is currently not supported on devices with multimonitor setups experiencing icon alignment issues.
- A resolution is being worked on and will be provided in an upcoming update. (LLM Synthesized)

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm that your device is set up in a multimonitor configuration before proceeding.
- Make the taskbar placement adjustment to avoid further disruptions.
